criterion "IsThirdGenerator" "worldC7M3GeneratorCount"  "2" required
criterion "IsLastGenerator" "worldC7M3GeneratorCount"  "3" required

criterion "IsNotBiker"        "Who"     "!=Biker"        required

//final button press
criterion "Conceptc7m3finalspeakmanager" "Concept" "c7m3finalspeakmanager" required
criterion "Conceptc7m3finalspeakteengirl" "Concept" "c7m3finalspeakteengirl" required
criterion "Conceptc7m3finalspeaknamvet" "Concept" "c7m3finalspeaknamvet" required
criterion "Conceptc7m3finalspeakbiker" "Concept" "c7m3finalspeakbiker" required


Response c7m3finalspeakbiker
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any c7m3finalspeakbiker foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule c7m3finalspeakbiker
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGenerator2On PanicEventBiker Ismapc7m3_Port
	Response c7m3finalspeakbiker
}


Response c7m3finalspeakmanager
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any c7m3finalspeakmanager foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule c7m3finalspeakmanager
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGenerator2On PanicEventmanager Ismapc7m3_Port
	Response c7m3finalspeakmanager
}

Response c7m3finalspeakteengirl
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any c7m3finalspeakteengirl foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule c7m3finalspeakteengirl
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGenerator2On PanicEventteengirl Ismapc7m3_Port
	Response c7m3finalspeakteengirl
}

Response c7m3finalspeaknamvet
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any c7m3finalspeaknamvet foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule c7m3finalspeaknamvet
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGenerator2On PanicEventnamvet Ismapc7m3_Port
	Response c7m3finalspeaknamvet
}






Response C7M3PressBOrator
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3GeneratorSpeakBiker foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3PressBOrator
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorPress PanicEventBiker Ismapc7m3_Port
	ApplyContext "SaidCreshendoStartNear:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3PressBOrator
}

Response C7M3GeneratorPressMOrator
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3GeneratorSpeakManager foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3GeneratorPressMOrator
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorPress PanicEventManager Ismapc7m3_Port
	ApplyContext "SaidCreshendoStartNear:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3GeneratorPressMOrator
}

{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3GeneratorSpeakNamVet foo:0 0.05 //
}

{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorPress PanicEventNamVet Ismapc7m3_Port
	ApplyContext "SaidCreshendoStartNear:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld

}

{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3GeneratorSpeakTeenGirl foo:0 0.05 //
}

{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorPress PanicEventTeenGirl Ismapc7m3_Port
	ApplyContext "SaidCreshendoStartNear:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3GeneratorPressTOrator
}


Response C7M3GeneratorOn1
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  
}
Rule C7M3GeneratorOn1
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorOn Ismapc7m3_Port IsFirstGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent                                                                                                                                                                                                
	ApplyContext "SaidCreshendoStartNear:1:0,C7M3GeneratorCount:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3GeneratorOn1
}

Response C7M3GeneratorOn2
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  
}
Rule C7M3GeneratorOn2
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorOn Ismapc7m3_Port  IsSecondGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent
	ApplyContext "SaidCreshendoStartNear:1:0,C7M3GeneratorCount:2:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3GeneratorOn2
}

Response C7M3GeneratorOn3
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  
}
Rule C7M3GeneratorOn3
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorOn Ismapc7m3_Port IsThirdGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent
	ApplyContext "SaidCreshendoStartNear:1:0,C7M3GeneratorCount:3:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3GeneratorOn3
}



///final button!
Response C7M3FinalPressBOrator
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3FinalSpeakBiker foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3FinalPressBOrator
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorOn Ismapc7m3_Port IsLastGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent PanicEventBiker 
	ApplyContext "SaidFinalLine:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3FinalPressBOrator
}

Response C7M3FinalPressMOrator
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3FinalSpeakManager foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3FinalPressMOrator
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorOn Ismapc7m3_Port IsLastGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent PanicEventManager
	ApplyContext "SaidFinalLine:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3FinalPressMOrator
}

Response C7M3FinalPressNOrator
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3FinalSpeakNamVet foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3FinalPressNOrator
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorOn Ismapc7m3_Port IsLastGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent PanicEventNamVet
	ApplyContext "SaidFinalLine:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3FinalPressNOrator
}

Response C7M3FinalPressTOrator
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3FinalSpeakTeenGirl foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3FinalPressTOrator
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorOn Ismapc7m3_Port IsLastGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent PanicEventTeenGirl
	ApplyContext "SaidFinalLine:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3FinalPressTOrator
}




/////Round over for generator
criterion "ConceptC7M3WaveOver" "Concept" "C7M3WaveOver" required
criterion "ConceptC7M3WaveOverGen1" "Concept" "C7M3WaveOverGen1" required
criterion "ConceptC7M3WaveOverGen2" "Concept" "C7M3WaveOverGen2" required
Response C7M3WaveOver1
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd" then Any C7M3WaveOverGen1 foo:0 0.05 //  
}
Rule C7M3WaveOver1
{
	criteria ConceptC7M3WaveOver Ismapc7m3_Port IsSecondGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent                                                                                                                                                                                                
	Response C7M3WaveOver1
}

Response C7M3WaveOver2
{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3WaveOverGen2 foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3WaveOver2
{
	criteria ConceptC7M3WaveOver Ismapc7m3_Port IsThirdGenerator ChanceToFire100Percent                                                                                                                                                                                                
	Response C7M3WaveOver2
}





///bridge breaks
criterion "conceptC7M3BridgeBreaks" "Concept" "C7M3BridgeBreaks" required

{
	scene "scenes/npcs/orator_blank.vcd"  then Any C7M3BridgeBreaks foo:0 0.05 //
}
Rule C7M3BridgeBreaks
{
	criteria ConceptCrashFinaleGeneratorBreak Ismapc7m3_Port
	Response C7M3BridgeBreaks
}

///Open Tank Car Door
criterion "ConceptC7M1OpenTankDoor" "Concept" "C7M1OpenTankDoor" required

criterion "conceptc7m1opentankdoorspeaknamvet" "Concept" "c7m1opentankdoorspeaknamvet" required

}
